text: Dughiar kamɨn, Asiriaba bar arazir kurabar Judabagh amima, Hesekia arɨmariam inigha atam areme. Ezɨ Emosɨn otarim Aisaia ghuava an ganigha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Nɨn arɨmariam gɨvaghan kogham, a ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ nɨ ovegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ gumazamizir nɨn dɨpenimɨn itibav kemeghtɨ, me nɨn ingangariba bar dar amu dar kɨrigh.’ ”
